Key Match Events: The Phoenix Suns rode an 11-0 run late in the fourth quarter to come back and send the game to overtime.
Kevin Durant scored 25 points and hit a game-tying fadeaway jumper to send the game to overtime.
Suns guard Bradley Beal contributed 24 points while going 66% from the field.
Clippers point guard James Harden contributed a near 30-point triple-double.
Clippers center Ivica Zubac scored 21 points, shooting 8-for-13 from the field.
Shooting guard Amir Coffey scored 11 points in the fourth quarter, shooting a perfect 4-for-4.
Post-Match Reflections: Kevin Durant admitted that 'The Wall' seating style at Intuit Dome rattled him.
The Clippers showed promise despite missing Kawhi Leonard indefinitely.
James Harden will need to shoulder a majority of the offensive load amidst Leonard’s absence.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was the Los Angeles Clippers' debut at the Intuit Dome.
The Clippers' new arena, Intuit Dome, was built to create an identity independent from the Los Angeles Lakers.
The new seating style 'The Wall' at Intuit Dome has gone viral on social media.
